name: Resume: The Video Game
description: Resume: The Video Game is an arcade style indie game, intended to demonstrate my game development ability. Play these fun mini-games: Brick Fish Racing, a multiplayer extraterrestrial racing game; Flap Tapper, a rhythmic flying game; and Chris Kerfuffle, a death match with quick size changes!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
